LOCAL.attribute.label: Attribute
LOCAL.body.label: Body
LOCAL.body.desc.label: Strength, speed, and physical fitness.
LOCAL.body.editBaseValue.label: Edit Body score.
LOCAL.body.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Body.
LOCAL.body.value.label: Total Body score.
LOCAL.mind.label: Mind
LOCAL.mind.desc.label: Speed of thought, and sharpness of intellect.
LOCAL.mind.editBaseValue.label: Edit Mind score.
LOCAL.mind.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Mind.
LOCAL.mind.value.label: Total Mind score.
LOCAL.soul.label: Soul
LOCAL.soul.desc.label: Spiritual power, and sense of self.
LOCAL.soul.editBaseValue.label: Edit Soul score.
LOCAL.soul.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Soul.
LOCAL.soul.value.label: Total Soul score.
LOCAL.awareness.label: Awareness
LOCAL.awareness.desc.label: Passive alertness and attention to detail.
LOCAL.awareness.baseValue.label: Base Awareness = (Mind + Training in Perception) / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.awareness.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Awareness.
LOCAL.awareness.value.label: Total Awareness.
LOCAL.accuracy.label: Accuracy
LOCAL.accuracy.desc.label: Effectiveness of ranged attacks. Affects difficulty of ranged attack rolls.
LOCAL.accuracy.baseValue.label: Base Accuracy = (Mind + Training in Ranged Weapons) / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.accuracy.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Accuracy.
LOCAL.accuracy.value.label: Total Accuracy.
LOCAL.defense.label: Defense
LOCAL.defense.desc.label: The ability to defend against attacks.
LOCAL.defense.baseValue.label: Base Defense = (Body + Dexterity) / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.defense.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Defense.
LOCAL.defense.value.label: Total Defense.
LOCAL.initiative.label: Initiative
LOCAL.initiative.desc.label: Readiness to act in combat. Affects turn order.
LOCAL.initiative.baseValue.label: Base Initiative = (Mind + Training in Perception & Dexterity) / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.initiative.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Initiative.
LOCAL.initiative.value.label: Total Initiative.
LOCAL.melee.label: Melee
LOCAL.melee.desc.label: Effectiveness of melee attacks. Affects difficulty of melee attack rolls.
LOCAL.melee.baseValue.label: Base Melee = (Body + Training in Melee Weapons) / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.melee.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Melee.
LOCAL.melee.value.label: Total Melee.
LOCAL.speed.label: Speed
LOCAL.stamina.label: Stamina
LOCAL.stamina.valueDesc.label: Stamina remaining. Depleted by damage.
LOCAL.stamina.max.label: Max Stamina = (Body + Mind + Soul).
LOCAL.stamina.editValue.label: Edit current Stamina.
LOCAL.stamina.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Max Stamina.
LOCAL.wounds.label: Wounds
LOCAL.wounds.valueDesc.label: Wounds Taken. Mortally Wounded when Max Wounds are Taken.
LOCAL.wounds.max.label: Max Wounds = (Body + Mind + Soul) / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.wounds.editValue.label: Edit current Wounds.
LOCAL.wounds.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Max Wounds
LOCAL.resolve.label: Resolve
LOCAL.resolve.valueDesc.label: Resolve remaining.
LOCAL.resolve.max.label: Max Resolve = Soul / 2, rounded up.
LOCAL.resolve.editValue.label: Edit current Resolve.
LOCAL.resolve.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Max Resolve.
LOCAL.stride.label: Stride
LOCAL.stride.desc.label: Walking or running on land.
LOCAL.stride.editBaseValue.label: Edit Stride speed.
LOCAL.stride.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Stride speed.
LOCAL.stride.value.label: Total Stride speed.
LOCAL.fly.label: Fly
LOCAL.fly.desc.label: Flying through the atmosphere
LOCAL.fly.editBaseValue.label: Edit Fly speed.
LOCAL.fly.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Fly speed.
LOCAL.fly.value.label: Total Fly speed.
LOCAL.swim.label: Swim
LOCAL.swim.desc.label: Swimming through water or other liquids.
LOCAL.swim.editBaseValue.label: Edit Swim speed.
LOCAL.swim.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Swim speed.
LOCAL.swim.value.label: Total Swim speed.
LOCAL.burrow.label: Burrow
LOCAL.burrow.desc.label: Burrowing through earth and rock.
LOCAL.burrow.editBaseValue.label: Edit Burrow speed.
LOCAL.burrow.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Burrow speed.
LOCAL.burrow.value.label: Total Burrow speed.
LOCAL.skillCheck.label: Skill Check
LOCAL.skill.label: Skill
LOCAL.skills.label: Skills
LOCAL.arcana.label: Arcana
LOCAL.arcana.desc.label: Arcana measures how much you know about arcane magic and creatures.
LOCAL.athletics.label: Athletics
LOCAL.athletics.desc.label: Athletics allows you to perform deeds of physical prowess.
LOCAL.deception.label: Deception
LOCAL.deception.desc.label: Deception allows you to trick and mislead others using disguises, lies, and other forms of subterfuge.
LOCAL.dexterity.label: Dexterity
LOCAL.dexterity.desc.label: Dexterity measures your ability to perform tasks requiring coordination, grace, and flexibility.
LOCAL.diplomacy.label: Diplomacy
LOCAL.diplomacy.desc.label: Diplomacy allows you to influence others through negotiation and flattery.
LOCAL.engineering.label: Engeineering
LOCAL.engineering.desc.label: Engineering measures your ability to create, understand, and repair complex items.
LOCAL.intimidation.label: Intimidation
LOCAL.intimidation.desc.label: Intimidation allows you to bend others to your will using threats.
LOCAL.investigation.label: Investigation
LOCAL.investigation.desc.label: Investigation measures your ability to find and make deductions from clues.
LOCAL.lore.label: Lore
LOCAL.lore.desc.label: Lore measures your overall breadth of knowledge in topics you are familiar with.
LOCAL.medicine.label: Medicine
LOCAL.medicine.desc.label: Medicine is your ability to patch up wounds and treat diseases and poisons.
LOCAL.meleeWeapons.label: Melee Weapons
LOCAL.meleeWeapons.desc.label: Measures your overall proficiency with melee weapons in combat.
LOCAL.nature.label: Nature
LOCAL.nature.desc.label: Measures how much you know about the natural world, and ability command and train beasts.
LOCAL.perception.label: Perception
LOCAL.perception.desc.label: Perception measures your ability to be aware of your environment and find hidden details.
LOCAL.performance.label: Performance
LOCAL.performance.desc.label: Your skill at a form of performance, and using your talents to impress an audience.
LOCAL.rangedWeapons.label: Ranged Weapons
LOCAL.rangedWeapons.desc.label: Measures your overall proficiency with ranged weapons in combat.
LOCAL.subterfuge.label: Subterfuge
LOCAL.subterfuge.desc.label: Measures your overall skill at physical trickery, such as picking a pocket or concealing an item.
LOCAL.stealth.label: Stealth
LOCAL.stealth.desc.label: Stealth allows you to remain undetected from other creatures.
LOCAL.theology.label: Theology
LOCAL.theology.desc.label: Theology measures your overall knowledge of spiritual matters.
LOCAL.resistanceCheck.label: Resistance Check
LOCAL.resistance.label: Resistance
LOCAL.resistances.label: Resistances
LOCAL.reflexes.label: Reflexes
LOCAL.reflexes.desc.label: Skill and speed at avoiding danger.
LOCAL.reflexes.baseValue.label: Base Reflexes = Mind + (Body / 2). rounded up.
LOCAL.reflexes.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Reflexes.
LOCAL.reflexes.value.label: Total Reflexes.
LOCAL.resilience.label: Resilience
LOCAL.resilience.desc.label: Physical constitution, and the ability to resist pain and illnesses.
LOCAL.resilience.baseValue.label: Base Resilience = Body + (Soul / 2), rounded up.
LOCAL.resilience.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Resilience.
LOCAL.resilience.value.label: Total Resilience.
LOCAL.willpower.label: Willpower
LOCAL.willpower.desc.label: Strength of will, and the ability to resist mental affects.
LOCAL.willpower.baseValue.label: Base Willpower = Soul + (Mind / 2). rounded up.
LOCAL.willpower.editStaticMod.label: Edit bonus or penalty to Willpower.
LOCAL.willpower.value.label: Total Willpower.

SETTINGS.getCheckOptions.label: Ask for Check Options by default.
SETTINGS.getCheckOptions.hint: Hold Shift to toggle this setting.

SETTINGS.initiativeFormula.label: Initiative Formula
SETTINGS.initiativeFormula.hint: Configure which method is used to determine who acts first in combat.
SETTINGS.initiativeFormula.flat: Highest to lowest Initative, no dice rolls.
